(หาดยาว) is one of the most beautiful beaches on
. The sandy beach stretches over one kilometre from
through to the headland that shelters the bay. The beach is very wide allowing a wide variety of sports and activities.

and the ferry terminal, the taxi ride is just ten minutes. The fare per person should be 100 baht, but cab drivers will produce a booklet that claims 150 baht is the standard fare. It is not, so bargain hard!
Walk around the beach and nearby. Rent a motorbike to head further afield. Shared taxis run to Thong Sala.
and the Full Moon Party is twenty five minutes away.

A live reef stretches along the bay and beyond. It's a short swim out (about 400 m) and well worth snorkelling along. Book boat tours from boats based at a pier. 

During high season several carelessly operated boat trips run straight from the beach (e.g., Black Coral Tours). These run their motors though the coral and have been known to cut it close with swimmers. Avoid them otherwise the beauty of the reef and beach will soon be damaged beyond repair.

value: directions=on the main road, opposite J.B. Hut and Easy Life
content= Includes herbal sauna. Thai with Dutch management. Beautiful sunsets in the lounge/bar/restaurant. Open 6 days a week. Thai and Western breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
directions=behind Silver Beach Bungalows. If you come from the main road, next to Apache Bar.
content=The first dive centre on the beach and a pioneer diving Ko Pha Ngan. PADI 5 Star IDC Dive Resort, Swiss management, friendly team, great boat.

content=Reefers 5 star dive centre is based at Shiralea Backpackers Resort with an additional booking office at Sandy Bay Resort on Haad Yao. The Shiralea site offers a friendly relaxed diving environment; the largest 3 m deep training pool on the island, airy classrooms, and equipment retail & rental. All PADI courses from beginner to pro, daily dive, and snorkel trips to all the best sites in the area.
directions=Up on the cliff at the start of the beach

content=Good breakfast for 100 baht. The view from the restaurant is well worth the climb. Cocktails start at 100 baht. Has a limited number of bungalows on the cliff at the beginning of Haad Yao. Clean, but a bit of a climb. No view. Fan room 300 baht, air-con 500 baht. Grounds are used as a drive through for the jet-ski operators.
content=Great burgers, crunchy salads, many vegetarian delights and great home made drinks. Free pool table and big screen TV. Free Wi-Fi.
directions=in the middle of the beach
content=The best Thai food on the beach but in the same price range as its neighbours. Thai dishes from 60 baht up. Friendly staff that treat repeat costumers well.
directions=In the middle of the beach
content=Has a beautiful balcony overlooking the sea. The prices are average, but the food is mediocre at best. Get a drink and enjoy the view.

There are many bars on the beach set within the hotels and bungalows. If you want a real (non-instant) coffee, head to the resort restaurant at the end of the beach.

value: content=Thirty large wooden villas with shared swimming pool set in landscaped gardens.
directions=on the hill just north of the beach, hidden behind Dream Hill and Bay View.
content=Simple, quite worn down, bungalows with fan and bath. Laid back feeling that makes it easy to forget about the development on the beach. Restaurant only open during high season.
content=Beautifully kept grounds and bungalows. Some of the bungalows have a view of the ocean/beach.
content=Thirty beach front rooms on one of the most popular beach destinations.
content=The pool stretches the entire length of the hotel and guests can enter the water from their balconies. There are fire juggling shows at night on the sea front.
content=Occupies the southern 1/4 of the beach. With swimming pool and restaurant.
content=Beach front villas. One and two bedroom villas with en suite baths.

content=Friendly food, tasty people. Relaxed, natural setting in coconut gardens, just 2 minutes walk from the beach. 21 stylish and authentic Thai-style bungalows, with hotel-grade mattresses and Western baths. Choice of fan or air-con, hot or cold water power shower. Bar & restaurant. Free Wi-Fi, satellite TV & movie lounge with 40" LCD. Swimming pool, Jacuzzi, baby pool, terrace, Thai massage on-site. Scuba diving and snorkelling with Reefers Diving also on-site.
